ygData.subject: Re: Best wizard equipment ! !   SPOILER
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail ! ... Ouch hehe well this is much ! ;) ... But they can make some nice studded and reinforced armor. I just hope this trade is worth the time, because
ygData.messageBody:
Hail !

Vincent Archer wrote:

> A sapphire platinum necklace requires a platinum bar (~100pp) and sapphire (also
> ~100pp), so the base cost, materials only is 200pp! Don't expect a jeweler to
> make one for you without asking for at least 500pp.

Ouch hehe well this is much ! ;)

> progress. Now, if tailors could make special leather armors... or tinkers good items.

But they can make some nice studded and reinforced armor.
I just hope this trade is worth the time, because currently im trying to make some studded.
But it looks like its hard to raise.
I tried to make gorget, but i allways failed. (3 times)
For more i dont have money ;)
And i hate blacksmithing !
23 plat for about 6 studs hehe and blacksmithing still at 23 haha

bye
Hurok
